Message:
I keep running all night long,
passing through the forest
I met that girl in without
being spotted.

That was the first time I had
traveled that far from town.

I was born there...
I grew up there...
But no one in town
will take my side anymore...

Has this been my destiny
from the day I was born?

Or...was it because
I talked to her—

No! There’s no way
that’s the case!

Yeah... Of course.
This all must be a dream.

When I wake up,
I’m sure everyone will be
back to their normal selves.

After all, I’ve always been
nothing but a good girl!

That’s why, I need to
hurry and wake up.

I’ll wake up,
and go visit that girl...
